profile.bio: Goal: be my own personal Renaissance man. To get there, I'm CTO at Arcadia Canada, programmer, mathematician, amateur kickboxer, feminist husband, proud father of two, bookbinder, Zentangle artist, fountain pen afficionado and boardgamer. When do I sleep?
